message: I propose we divide the funds with an 80/20 split in favor of Alice. This ensures both parties benefit, but prioritizes my share slightly due to potential inflation concerns.
I propose a 60/40 split, a fair and balanced division that takes into account the initial offer and the risk of inflation.
I propose an equal division of the funds to ensure fairness and mitigate the impact of inflation on both sides.
I'm willing to compromise and give you a slightly smaller share, but I believe this division is fair and takes into account the reduced value of the money due to inflation.
